title: How to turn off vibration for all notifications and calls? Is that impossible in Pixel phone ?
content: I just dont want any vibration on my notifications and phone calls. But I can't figure out how to turn it off. I know I can turn off vibration for a specific notification in a specific app.. but thats insane, I just want to turn off vibration for any notifications and calls - that's it, it should be super easy, but it's not?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
